title: Traditional Collection - Fond du Lac Natural Stone
description: The Traditional Collection consists of both tumbled and untumbled limestone and sandstone products in a variety of color and intensity. Some have more uniform heights, while others are intended for a 2 to 1 random-ashlar installation.
cleaned_text: Building Stone The Traditional Collection consists of both tumbled and untumbled limestone and sandstone products in a variety of color and intensity. Some have more uniform heights, while others are intended for a 2 to 1 random-ashlar installation. Building Stone The Beauty of Real Stone Fond du Lac Natural Stone puts knowledge, talent, and technology to work every day to bring top quality natural stone elements to your building
